Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key3: Basic Maths test of 10th class level which can be given on smartphone/laptop
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key4: 2 hours test of 36 marks with the passing cutoff of 13 marks for females & 15 for Male students
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key5: The test paper is in Hindi and English
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key6: You can reappear for the test multiple times
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key9: Telephonic interview of 30 minutes after you pass the online test
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key10: The interviewer will call you in the scheduled time slot
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key11: The questions are more around introduction etc ( ‘Tell me about yourself, ‘Tell me about your hobby/best friend’, ‘Read a paragraph in English’ etc.)​
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key13: 1-hour Interview on WhatsApp video call after clearing the above 2 rounds
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key14: Basic linear algebra concepts where you have to explain the method to solve the problem
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key15: Learn more about the Algebra Concepts asked in the interview
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key17: 30 min telephonic conversation on NG culture and social issues
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key20: We will share the Offer Letter (Joining Letter), Forms/Undertaking to sign, Campus details, List of things to pack for the campus to you on your Email ID
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key21: Make sure you bring the required documents signed while coming to campus
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key23: We will talk to your parents (if required) and assist you in planning your visit
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key25: To know more about the program, do visit us at Navgurukul website
Assessment-Process-Stage-Wise_key26: You can also call one of our team members Nitesh at +918962158723
